eu_initiatives: ORCA implements activities directed toward supporting Serbia's EU integration process (focusing on negotiation chapters related to agriculture and rural development – Chapter 11; food safety, veterinary and fitosanitary policy - Chapter 12; fisheries – Chapter 13 and environment and climate change – Chapter 27). ORCA is a member of the EU Platform on Animal Welfare, an expert group tasked to assist the European Commission with the development and exchange of coordinated actions on animal welfare. ORCA has been selected by DG SANTE as only CSO from the Western Balkan region. ORCA is committed to the improvement of policies, legislation and practice related to animal welfare, environmental protection in Serbia, through various activities such as analysis, creating proposals to change the laws and regulations, creation of policy documents, and advocating for the adoption of such proposals (e.g. Animal Welfare Law, Nature Protection Law, Veterinary Law, National Sustainable Development Strategy, etc.). Currently, in the frame of the EU funded regional project, we are coordinating development of a regional policy on sustainable agriculture.
organisation_name: Organisation for Respect and Care of Animals (ORCA)
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
membership:
ORCA is a member of EU Platform on Animal Welfare, and expert body of the European Commission.  
 
In addition we are members of several international networks:  
- Eurogroup for Animals,  
- Species Survival Network,  
- CEEWeb for Biodiversity  
- EUROBATS (member of advisory board).  
 
ORCA is also a member of important national networks and bodies such as:  
- National Convention on the European Union (NCEU)  
- Sectorial Civic Society Organizations (SCSO) 
Both NCEU and SCSO are platforms for consultations between national authorities and civil sector in relation to EU intergration process 
- Network Natura 2000, Resource Centre of Serbia,  
- Council for the Improvement of Food Production Sector,  
- National Ethical Council for the Welfare of Animals used in Research and local ethical committees at faculties and scientific institutions in Serbia (University of Belgrade - Faculties of Medicine, Biology, Agriculture and Pharmacy; Institute for the Application of Nuclear Energy – INEP, Military Medical Academy, Institute of Virology, Vaccines and Sera “Torlak”). 
 
More information on: 
http://www.orca.rs/en/who-are-we/our-mission/ 
http://www.orca.rs/en/what-we-do/ethics-committees/
